description:
A first-year student at Minegahara High School, and an honor student who attends the cram school where Sakuta works part-time as a teacher. After Sara`s previous cram school teacher runs into some trouble and decides to leave the school, she takes an interest in Sakuta who is teaching a different student. She is friendly and effortlessly befriends people, and is childhood friends with Toranosuke Kasai, who is Rio`s student at the same cram school.
Source: Official page
name: Himeji Sara
